awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: A biography of the dancer Isadora Duncan, the 1920s dancer who forever changed people's ideas of ballet. Her nude, semi-nude, and pro-Soviet dance projects as well as her attitudes on free love, debt, dress, and lifestyle shocked the public of her time.

title: Isadora
